title: How Do I Live Without You
lyrics: Intro  ... ... (Fsus)  How do I Get through one night(G/B) without you If I had to live without you What kind of life(C/G) would that be? Oh I need you in my arms(G?B) Your my world my heart my soul If you ever leave Baby you'd take away everything good in my Life. ... And tell me now(Bb/F) How do I live without you I(Bb/D) want to know How do I breathe (Bb/F) without you If you(Bb/D) ever(Bb/F) go How do I ever, ever(bass d eb f eb) survive? How do I (Fsus) O how do I live?. Baby you would take away everything real in My life Baby don't you know your everything good in My life
